item.title: Galactic Center Saga
item.description: Galactic Center Saga Still have to read these. The Galactic Center Saga is a series of books by author Gregory Benford detailing a galactic war between mechanical and biological life. Personal notes Found about it in a post on scifi stackexchange post (OP asked to identify a book they’ve read in the early 1990s). The synopsis, as described by OP, made me interested in the whole series. Read this sometime in late 1980s / early 1990s.
